thread.title: Forest City to Webcast Special Meeting of Shareholders
thread.title_full: Forest City to Webcast Special Meeting of Shareholders - Yahoo Finance

author: Forest City Enterprises, Inc.
title: Forest City to Webcast Special Meeting of Shareholders
text:
CLEVELAND, Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Forest City Enterprises, Inc., (NYSE:FCEA and FCEB) today announced that the Company will webcast its upcoming Special Meeting of Shareholders beginning at 2:00 p.m. eastern time on Tuesday, October 20, 2015. The meeting will be held in the Skylight Room, Tower City Center, Skylight Level 3, 230 West Huron Road, Cleveland, Ohio.
View photo
. The meeting will be available live over the internet through an audio webcast. To access the webcast, please visit the main Investors page of the Company's website, www.forestcity.net . A webcast replay will also be available.
About Forest City
Forest City Enterprises, Inc. is a NYSE-listed national real estate company with $10.3 billion in consolidated assets. The Company is principally engaged in the ownership, development, management and acquisition of commercial and residential real estate throughout the United States. For more information, visit www.forestcity.net .
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20080515/FRSTCTYLOGO 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/forest-city-to-webcast-special-meeting-of-shareholders-300159895.html 
Professional Services Forest City Enterprises
